alert.note: Alert for Bonner; Boundary (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 25 at 8:59AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center in Sandpoint has issued a Backcountry Avalanche Warning... * WHAT...The avalanche danger for the warning area remains high today. * WHERE...The Selkirk, Cabinet, and Purcell Mountains of the Idaho Panhandle and Northwest Montana. * WHEN...In effect from Sat 07:00 PST to Sun 07:00 PST. * IMPACTS...Recent and continuing heavy snowfall and wind are resulting in widespread areas of unstable snow. * PRECAUTIONARY / PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Very dangerous avalanche conditions. Travel in avalanche terrain is not recommended. Avalanches may run long distances and can run into mature forests, valley floors, or flat terrain. Consult http://www.idahopanhandleavalanche.org/ or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
